PIFDataModel

The PIFDataModel package (https://github.com/fsqanalytics/PIFDataModel.git) helps manage and document JSON schemas in R. It supports loading, validating, and generating documentation for JSON schemas.

Installation 

# Install development version
devtools::install_github("fsqanalytics/PIFDataModel")

Usage 

library(PIFDataModel)

Load a schema 

schema <- load_schema("user_schema.json")

Validate JSON data 

json_data <- '{"id": 1, "name": "Alice", "email": "alice@example.com"}'
validate_schema(json_data, "user_schema.json")

### Generate documentation
document_schema("user_schema.json")
